turn.2: Battle of Avdiivka The Battle of Avdiivka was a battle in the War in Donbass near Avdiivka, Donetsk region, Ukraine.
turn.3: What were some of the battles in the Battle of Avdiivka?
turn.4: It marked the deadliest fighting in the ongoing War in Donbass in weeks.
turn.5: What were some of the weapons used in the Battle of Avdiivka?
turn.6: According to the OSCE Special Monitoring Mission to Ukraine the battle was of a level of fighting in Ukraine that had not been seen since 2014–15.
turn.7: Who won the Battle of Avdiivka?
turn.8: On 21 July 2014, during the War in Donbass, Ukrainian forces recaptured Avdiivka from pro-Russian separatists.
turn.10: Avdiivka is located only north of Donetsk.

turn.12: Between Donetsk and Avdiivka stretches Highway M04 which circles Donetsk around its north side and is part of the European route 50.
